metadata.title: CVE-2024-49860 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ACPI: sysfs: validate return type of _STR methodOnly buffer objects are valid return values of _STR.If something else is returned description_show() will access invalidmemory.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
